metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Glow Pt 2 has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: The Glow Pt 2 has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and E Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
